comprehensive_overview: The xcb-util-keysyms library provides utility functions for obtaining the keysyms keycode values, as used in the X Window System, as well as common XKB functions. It is part of the X C Bindings (XCB) utility libraries which provide a number of convenience functions and interfaces for usage with XCB.
core_features: 1. Easily obtain keysyms keycode values in the X Window System. 2. Includes common XKB functions for enhanced key mapping and handling. 3. Compatible with XCB utility libraries for seamless integration with the X Window System applications.
